lemma Neg_splits: "P (case \<phi> of formula.Neg \<psi> \<Rightarrow> f \<psi> | \<phi> \<Rightarrow> g \<phi>) = ((\<forall>\<psi>. \<phi> = formula.Neg \<psi> \<longrightarrow> P (f \<psi>)) \<and> ((\<not> Formula.is_Neg \<phi>) \<longrightarrow> P (g \<phi>)))" "P (case \<phi> of formula.Neg \<psi> \<Rightarrow> f \<psi> | _ \<Rightarrow> g \<phi>) = (\<not> ((\<exists>\<psi>. \<phi> = formula.Neg \<psi> \<and> \<not> P (f \<psi>)) \<or> ((\<not> Formula.is_Neg \<phi>) \<and> \<not> P (g \<phi>))))"
